patterns: How to apply for CSE department?
responses: Admissions for the B.E. CSE program are now open. Apply via the official Sona College portal.
You can join CSE with a strong academic record in higher secondary and a passion for computing!

Be part of our vibrant tech community through clubs and forums where innovation thrives.
CSE Department boasts a 90%+ placement rate. Our top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Zoho, and Amazon.
Students have received offers up to 12 LPA. We provide extensive training and internship support too!
